Cohort: Values represent C-index (95% CI) for overall survival prediction.
IMDC = International Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma Database Consortium;
Meet-URO = Meet-URO prognostic model; IO = immune checkpoint inhibitor; TKI = tyrosine kinase inhibitor.
IO-IO includes nivolumab plus ipilimumab; IO-TKI includes pembrolizumab plus axitinib, nivolumab plus cabozantinib, and pembrolizumab plus lenvatinib.
